about_the_game:
Title: Run and Gun 2: Opossum City

Genre: Zombie Shooter

Description: Not only open world, it’s “open season” on zombies. Welcome to Opossum City, it’s nice to eat you. Here you are trapped in a gothic urban landscape, surrounded by the undead, and low on gas. Your mission: escape the zombified streets, uncover the ghastly secrets of Alex Manor, and try to keep your head—literally.

Key Features:

  • Open World Exploration: Roam freely through a procedurally generated city. Until you hit a dead end street.

  • 8-Player Co-op Multiplayer: Why face certain doom alone? Easily connect with your Steam friends. Just click "host" and invite your steam friends to your game. Just like parallel lines, you and your Steam friends have a lot in common but will never meet.

  • Multiple Locations: A stereotypical creepy gothic city, an abandoned mall (is there another kind now?), a creepy cemetery, a farmhouse with boarded windows, and a gothic mansion loaded with puzzles. Before you step out, be sure you are dressed to kill.

  • Challenging Puzzles: So many big brain puzzles it has the zombies salivating.

  • Drivable Cars and Flyable Helicopters (with mini guns!): Navigate Opossum City with a variety of vehicles. Because what’s an escape plan without a joyride in a zombie apocalypse?

  • High-End Graphics: Unreal Engine 5 nanite and lumen yield stunning visuals that make the apocalypse look scarily real. You might just think you are running Crysis.

  • Engaging NPCs: Meet a cast of quirky characters offering side quests. Including a bowling ball who will send the undead fools flying! You’ll get more strikes than an Amazon fulfillment center.

  • Nostalgic and Light-Hearted: Enjoy a light-hearted and nostalgic nod to classic zombie horror games and films, blending humor and horror. Go out and paint the town dead!

Objective: Survive endless zombie ambushes, solve the mystery of Alex Manor, and make it out of Opossum City alive. It's just another day in the life, right?

Target Audience: Ideal for fans of zombie shooters, open-world adventures, and cooperative multiplayer chaos. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the genre, Run and Gun 2: Opossum City offers a mix of thrills, chills, and laughs for everyone.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild gun and zombie violence throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Open world, up to 8 player coop multiplayer, third person, zombie shooter, procedural generation, multiple locations, drivable cars, and oh yeah, flyable helicopters with mini guns. Escape the infested Opossum City streets and uncover dark secrets within Alex Manor in this nostalgic zombie shooter.
